cause.description:
By switching off your computer when you're not using it, you'll save both your computer and the environment (through less energy consumption)!
Please help us to make the world a better place!
Every little thing counts! Let's start by doing this!
THANK YOU for taking part!
1. Energy consumption has to go down!
2. We need to save our Planet!
cause.name: Turn off your computer > Save the environment!
